actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 93-699.

official_title: Resolves, that there be printed for the use of the Special Committee on Aging fourteen thousand additional copies of its committee print entitled "Protecting Older Americans Against Overpayment of Income Taxes".

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Provides that there shall be printed for the use of the Senate Special Committee on Aging 12,000 additional copies of its committee print entitled "Protecting Older Americans Against Overpayment of Income Taxes."

titles.title: Resolves, that there be printed for the use of the Special Committee on Aging fourteen thousand additional copies of its committee print entitled "Protecting Older Americans Against Overpayment of Income Taxes".
